title: Igor Tudor - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 March 2025, Tudor replaced Thiago Motta as head coach of Serie A club Juventus. This appointment marked the first time Juventus had appointed a foreign manager since Didier Deschamps in the 2006–07 season. title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season. The 47-year-old was appointed by the club in March, replacing Thiago Motta, who only lasted nine months in the role.
